snippet: The delicate wordplay of Nöel Coward and Cole Porter is the focus of “Mad Dogs and Educated Fleas” in the Lyrics & Lyricists series at the 92nd Street Y.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance of songs by Noel Coward and Cole Porter at the 92nd Street Y, as part of its Lyrics & Lyricists series.
lead_paragraph: The delicate wordplay of Nöel Coward and Cole Porter is the focus of “Mad Dogs and Educated Fleas” in the Lyrics & Lyricists series at the 92nd Street Y.

headline.seo: Porter and Coward Tunes at Lyrics & Lyricists at 92nd St. Y
headline.main: From Coward and Porter, a Night of Songs Witty, Wistful and Wise
headline.print_headline: From Coward and Porter, a Night of Songs Witty, Wistful and Wise
